Entries.Leah0: ...$l#$e#I'm a little...actually quite nervous. But happy.$h

Entries.Introduction: Hello, it's nice to meet you. $h#$e#You picked a good time to move here... The spring is lovely. $h#$e# But y'know, you'll pass out wearing that in the sun
Entries.winter_Fri: Time seems to move slower here.#$e#When I lived in the city, the years went by so fast.

Entries.NPC.cs.3980: $q 10001 give_pendant#?!...#$r 10001 0 give_pendant# Will you marry me?

Entries.give_flowersA: Thanks...though. Y'know, you're pretty cute with a blush like that. Riftwalker$h/Thanks...though. Y'know, you're pretty cute with a blush like that. Farmboy$h/
Entries.give_flowersB: Ohhh, @!  I would love to be your true love.$h
Entries.give_pendant: .....$8#$b#@, I don't know what to say..$8#$b#...$7#$b#Yes... I accept...$4#$b#I can't, I'm so happy... I think I will need 3 days to pack everything up.$h

Entries.afterArtShow: Dear @,^Thanks again for coming to my art show. It was such a success! I sold nearly all of my sculptures, and everyone was so positive and encouraging! I hope to see you again soon.  ^   -Skye[#]Skye's Thank-you Note
Entries.Demetrius: @,^I was conducting a field study the other day, and I found this specimen. ^I hope you find it as interesting as I did.    ^   -Viper%item object 392 1 394 1 132 1 66 1 %%[#]A Gift From Viper
Entries.DemetriusReward: Hi @,^^Thanks for your help with the fish.^Nature is usually good at keeping things balanced, but sometimes artificial factors can cause an imbalance.^^I've enclosed a blueprint from a science magazine that you might find interesting.^^-Viper%item craftingRecipe Farm_Computer %%[#]Viper's Thank You
Entries.DemetriusCooking: I wanted to say 'thanks' for taking an interest in my work. Here's a cooking recipe. ^   -Viper%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Viper's Recipe
Entries.summer_28: Dear @,^Tonight at around 10 o'clock PM, a rare and beautiful event will take place.^^The moonlight jellies will be passing by Pelican Town on their long journey south for the winter.^^We're all gathering at the beach to watch. You don't want to miss this!^See you tonight,^ -Viper[#]Dance Of The Moonlight Jellies
Entries.summer_20_1: @-^I'm gathering data on the correlation between soil alkalinity and crop fructose levels. Long story short, I need a fresh melon from your farm. If you brought me one I'd be very grateful.^   -Viper%item quest 104 %%[#]Viper Asks For A Sample
Entries.summer_6_2: Fisherman Wanted^I need a good pufferfish specimen. I'm conducting an experiment on the toxin created by the pufferfish.^Reward: 1000g^ -Viper%item quest 118 %%[#]Viper's Study On Toxins
Entries.fall_8_1: Hello,^It's blackberry season right now. The bushes are full of them. I want to pick some, but I lost my basket. Can you help?^   -Sova%item quest 107 %%[#]Sova Lost His Basket
Entries.passedOut2: @, ^You're lucky I found you last night! You were unconscious, and someone was searching your pockets. I have no idea how much money they took... they ran away as soon as I approached. Be more careful!^^-Sova[#]Note From Sova
Entries.linusTrashCleanup: Hi @,^^Thanks for helping me clean up around the valley.^The waters are looking much cleaner. I think everyone will appreciate it. I know I will.^As a way of saying 'thanks', I wanted to teach you how to grow your own fiber. I hope it's useful.^^-Sova's%item craftingRecipe Fiber_Seeds %%[#]Sova's Thank You
Entries.Linus: Hello, friend.^The mountain lake has been kind to me lately. I'd like to share my good fortune with you.  ^   -Sova %item object 136 1 143 1 202 1 227 1 228 1 %%[#]A Gift From Sova
Entries.LinusCooking: @,^how are you doing? I've enclosed some instructions on how to make one of my favorite fish recipes. ^   -Sova%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Sova's Recipe
Entries.Lewis: @,^I'm really glad you've become part of our community! I've enclosed a 500g check from the Stardew Valley Agricultural Fund to help you continue your good work. ^Maybe you can buy some more seeds with it.  ^  Sincerely, Mr. Byrne%item money 500 501 %%[#]A Gift From Brimstone
Entries.SeaAmulet: @,^I'm going to give you this advice because I like your guts and I want you to stay. If there comes a day that you want to ask for someone's hand in marriage, you'll need to give them a 'Mermaid's Pendant'. Don't worry, everyone in Pelican Town understands the significance of the amulet. It's an ancient tradition in this region. Good luck! ^   -Brimmie with the Stimmie[#]About Mermaid's Pendants
Entries.LewisCooking: @,^remember to eat healthy, or you won't have enough energy to work hard! I'm including one of my favorite recipes, that I got from my friend Lewis. Make sure to use ripe tomatoes! ^   -Brimstone%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Lewis's Recipe
Entries.quest35: Dear @,^You've been such a help around town since you moved here... everyone keeps telling me all the wonderful things you've done for them! Please accept this thank-you prize. ^   -Mayor%item money 2500 2501 %%[#]Thank-you From Brimstone
Entries.lewisStatue: @,^^In the future, I'd appreciate it very much if you refrained from placing my PRIVATE belongings in town for all to see!^^I'm very displeased!^^Take this money and never speak of my 'project' to anyone.%item money 750 751 %%[#]Brimstone's Angry Letter
Entries.foundLostTools: Dear @,^Someone dropped your tools into the lost and found bin last night.^^Stop by the mayor's office to pick them up. ^^  -Mayor Brimstone[#]Lost Tools
Entries.winter_18: Dear @,^I would like to give you some information about an upcoming event: the Feast of the Winter Star. It's a time for the community to come together and think back on all the good fortune we've had this year.^A favorite tradition is the "secret gift exchange", where everyone in town is randomly assigned to someone else. On the day of the festival, everyone brings a gift for their secret friend and surprise them with something special!^This year, your secret friend is:^    %secretsanta ^Don't tell anyone! The feast will take place on the 25th from 10AM to 2PM at the town square. See you then! ^   -Mayor Brimstone[#]Secret Gift-Giver
Entries.spring_12: Hello @,^Tomorrow we're holding the Egg Festival in the town square. ^^You should arrive between 9 AM and 2 PM if you'd like to attend.^You wouldn't want to miss the annual egg hunt!^  -Mayor Brimstone[#]Egg Festival Notice
Entries.spring_23: Dear @,^Tomorrow we're all getting together for the Flower Dance.^^If you can find a partner, you might even want to participate in the dance yourself! (Maybe Skye? ;))^There's a little clearing beyond the forest west of town where we hold the dance. Be careful hurting Arrive between 9 AM and 2 PM if you're interested.^  -Mayor Brimstone[#]Flower Dance Notice
Entries.summer_10: Dear @,^Tomorrow we're all gathering at the beach for the annual Pelican Town Luau.^^The highlight of the event is the communal potluck, a hotpot. Make sure you bring something good to contribute!^The governor himself is attending the event, so make sure you're on your best behavior.^Come to the beach sometime between 9 AM and 2 PM.^   -Mayor Brimstone[#]Luau Notice
Entries.fall_9: Dear @,^One week from today, we are holding the Stardew Valley Fair in the town square!^It's the biggest event of the year, drawing people from all across the country to our humble town.^If you'd like, you can set up a grange display for the event. Just bring up to 9 items that best showcase your talents. You'll be judged on the quality and diversity of your display.^The fair starts at 9 AM... don't miss it!^   -Brimstone[#]Stardew Valley Fair Notice
Entries.fall_15: Dear @,^I just want to remind you that the Stardew Valley Fair is happening tomorrow.^Don't forget to bring your 9 items for the grange display.^Remember, the fair starts at 9AM in the town square. See you there!^   - Brimstone[#]Stardew Valley Fair Reminder
Entries.fall_26: Dear @,^Notice a chill in the air? It could just be the approach of winter...^Or it could be the tingle of a dark specter, here to help us celebrate tomorrow's festival... the Spirit's Eve.^Come to town at 10 PM if you'd like to participate.^  -Brimstone[#]Spirit's Eve Notice
Entries.winter_7: Dear @,^Tomorrow we're all gathering in front of Marnie's house for the Festival of Ice.^^It's a celebration of winter... there'll be snowmen, ice sculptures, and an ice fishing competition!^Arrive between 9 AM and 2 PM if you'd like to participate.^  -Brimstone[#]Festival Of Ice Notice
Entries.summer_3_1: @-^This is embarrassing... I lost my lucky purple shorts. I'm telling you because I think I can trust you.^If you find them, bring them back to me DISCREETLY. I'll pay well.^Thanks.^   -Mayor Brimstone%item quest 102 %%[#]Lewis Asks For A Favor
Entries.summer_21_2: @,^I need truffle oil. Don't ask me why.^ -Mayor Brimstone%item quest 120 %%[#]Brimstone's Request
Entries.winter_24: Dear @,^Tomorrow is the Feast of the Winter Star.^Did you get a gift for your 'secret friend'... %secretsanta?^The feast starts at 9 AM in the town square. See you then! ^   -Mayor Brimstone[#]Feast Of The Winter Star Reminder
Entries.MSB_Lewis: @,^I wanted to thank you for taking care of my special order. All of the hard work you've done has been a great boost to Pelican Town's image.^Here's a 'Mini-Shipping Bin' as a token of my appreciation.^Place it anywhere and I'll be sure to make a stop when I make my rounds.^Don't use it too much though, my joints crack with me just thinking about it.^^   -Brimstone%item bigobject 248 %%[#]Brimstone's Thank You
Entries.Clint: Um, Hello...     ^Sorry, I'm not good at writing letters. I made one metal bar too many, and I thought you might need it.  ^   -Breach, the blacksmith %item object 334 1 335 1 336 1 %%[#]A Gift From Breach
Entries.ClintCooking: Well, I know a couple of recipes.^I thought I'd send you one... maybe it'll help you mine more ore or something.^Take care. ^   -Breach%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Breach's Recipe
Entries.winter_6_1: I've got an unusual request. Could you keep this a secret?^ I want you to deliver an amethyst to Emily. It's her favorite stone. Tell her it's from me.^   -Breach %item quest 110 %%[#]Breach's Unusual Request
Entries.winter_17_1: @,^Sorry to bother you again, but I need another favor.^I got a new hammer and I want to try it on a variety of metals.^Could you smelt an iron bar and bring it to me? ^Thanks.^ -Breach %item quest 112 %%[#]Breach's Request
Entries.spring_1_2: Notice:^^The price of raw materials at Robin's shop and Breach's shop has increased.[#]Raw Material Price Notice
Entries.ClintReward: Um, Hello...     ^Thanks for helping me clear out those monsters.^^I'm not scared at all! ...But it should make the mines safer for everyone else... right?^^Take this blueprint. (Hope it doesn't make me obsolete...)^^   -Breach, the blacksmith%item craftingRecipe Geode_Crusher %%[#]Breach's Thank-you
Entries.ClintReward2: Um, Hello...     ^Thanks for helping me clear out more monsters.^^Maybe next time, I'll take care of them myself... if I have time!^^Take this item. I found it in the back room...^^   -Breach %item object 286 10 287 5 231 3 %%[#]Breach's Alternate Thank-you
Entries.harveyBalloon: @,^I have a surprise for you. Meet me by the railroad tracks. ^   -Sage[#]Sage's Surprise
Entries.passedOut3_Billed: @,^Someone dropped you off at the clinic last night. You'd passed out from exhaustion!^You've got to take better care of yourself and go to bed at a reasonable hour.^I've billed you {0}c to cover your medical expenses.^^-Dr. Sage[#]From The Office Of Dr. Sage
Entries.passedOut3_NotBilled: @,^Someone dropped you off at the clinic last night. You'd passed out from exhaustion!^You've got to take better care of yourself and go to bed at a reasonable hour.^Since you have no money, I provided your medical care free of charge.^^-Dr. Sage[#]Sage's Free Medical Service
Entries.samMessage: @,^meet me in front of my house tonight after dark. ^   -Phoenix[#]Phoenix's Note
Entries.afterSamShow: @,^the show was a rockin' success! I wanted to say thanks again for all your help in creating this amazing band. We couldn't have done it without you!   ^   -Phoenix[#]Phoenix's Thank-you Note
Entries.haleyGarden: @,^I thought it would be fun to write you a note.^ I had so much fun with the cows yesterday... I'm starting to understand why you chose the farmer's life! Hope to see you soon.  ^   -Raze[#]Raze's Note
Entries.KrobusCrafting: @, I'm not sure how the human message system works, so I asked Wizard to help me write this letter.^^I hope you are doing okay.^^I wanted to share this with you... it's notes on how my people build a certain item.^^   -Omen%item craftingRecipe Dark_Sign %%[#]A letter from Omen
Entries.Sandy: Greetings from Calico Desert!^Come visit me soon, I'm really bored out here :(. I've included a gift from the desert. You can come and thank me in person!   ^   -Astra %item object 88 1 90 1 218 1 %%[#]A Gift From Astra
Entries.guntherBones: Hi @,^^Thanks for all the bones. I've got a lot to sort through here! To think, each fragment belonged to a living, breathing body from the past. Fascinating.^^Please accept this unique crafting recipe as a thank-you gift!^^-Cypher%item craftingRecipe Bone_Mill %%[#]Cypher's Note
Entries.landslideDone: To our valued JojaMart customers:^Our team members have removed the landslide caused by our drilling operation near the mountain lake. I'd like to remind you that our drilling operation is entirely legal (pursuant to init. L61091, JojaCo Amendment). Responsible stewardship of the local environment is our top priority! ^^We apologize for any inconvenience this accident may have caused.^As always, we value your continued support and patronage!^^-Chamber,^Joja Customer Satisfaction Representative[#]Joja Removed Landslide
Entries.passedOut1_Billed_Male: Dear Mr. @,^Last night, a Joja team member found you incapacitated. A medical team was dispatched to bring you home safely.^We're glad you're okay!^^(You've been billed {0}g for this service)^^-Chamber^Joja Customer Satisfaction Representative[#]Joja Invoice
Entries.passedOut1_Billed_Female: Dear Ms. @,^Last night, a Joja team member found you incapacitated. A medical team was dispatched to bring you home safely.^We're glad you're okay!^^(You've been billed {0}g for this service)^^-Chamber^Joja Customer Satisfaction Representative[#]Joja Invoice
Entries.passedOut1_NotBilled_Male: Dear Mr. @,^Last night, a Joja team member found you incapacitated. A medical team was dispatched to bring you home safely.^We're glad you're okay!^^Since you have no money, we were obligated by law to provide this service free of charge.^^-Chamber^Joja Customer Satisfaction Representative[#]Legally Required Notice
Entries.passedOut1_NotBilled_Female: Dear Ms. @,^Last night, a Joja team member found you incapacitated. A medical team was dispatched to bring you home safely.^We're glad you're okay!^^Since you have no money, we were obligated by law to provide this service free of charge.^^-Chamber^Joja Customer Satisfaction Representative[#]Legally Required Notice
Entries.carolineSO: Hi @,^^Brimstone told me that you've been shipping a lot of ingredients from the island! It's great to have access to new produce... it really opens a whole new world of culinary possibilities!^I'm including a gift for you... some blueprints you might find useful.^^-Caroline%item craftingRecipe Solar_Panel %%[#]Caroline's Tropical Ingredients

Entries.name: Saturday Codlight
Entries.intro: 0/Hi there, fellow fish. Every week I travel around the country to meet Lingcod from all different swims of life. Together, we'll broaden our horizons and learn about unique careers, lifestyles, and perspectives. For example unique ways to not get caught by a bear. I'm Tom Lingcod, and you're watching 'Saturday Codlight'.
